about_the_game:
Combo Haven is a game that aims to distill the most exciting aspect of platform fighting games: doing cool combos! Without having to worry about putting in countless hours of effort or outplaying opponents with years of practice, in Combo Haven anyone can experience the satisfying thrill of landing a nasty combo.

If you are someone who likes to be challenged, rest assured. Underneath the relatively forgiving and easy to learn controls and physics of Combo Haven, lies a significant level of mechanical depth, for those who aim to beat the developer high scores and reach the top of the leaderboards.

Combo Haven is currently in development. I hope to release a polished free demo to Steam by mid 2025, and the full version by the end of 2025. The demo will include 4-5 levels, with one playable character.

The full version will include 20+ unique levels, and 3 different playable characters, as well as global leaderboards, replay saving features, and an original soundtrack.

short_description: Combo Haven is a platform fighter inspired single-player game where your only task is to perform the sickest combos possible. Progress through a variety of levels and compete for high scores. Uncover new mechanics, abilities and characters along the way.
